meanings.definition: A member of the aristocracy in ancient Athens.
meanings.sent1: In ancient Athens, the eupatrids held significant power and influence.
meanings.sent2: The eupatrids were respected members of the upper class in ancient Athens.
meanings.sent3: The eupatrids in Athens probably had fancy parties with lots of grapes.
meanings.sent4: Among the citizens, the eupatrids stood tall like ancient pillars.
meanings.sent5: The eupatrids were like the kings of the city, overseeing all affairs.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the aristocracy in ancient Athens.
meanings.sent1: The eupatrids lifestyle in ancient Athens was luxurious and grand.
meanings.sent2: Eupatrids customs were followed by those aspiring to join the elite in Athens.
meanings.sent3: The eupatrids fashion in Athens must have been quite elegant and sophisticated.
meanings.sent4: Her demeanor was so eupatrids, exuding grace and refinement.
meanings.sent5: The eupatrids influence in Athens was evident in every aspect of society.
